defaultMessage: Living room with a fireplace. The house is decorated with an elder look to preserve the feeling of elder farmhouse.
The kitchen has been renovated with a retro style (year 2017).
Here the house is seen with lilic pergola, everything for lazy, wonderful days.
Live in an idyllic farm environment.
Happy pigs that are allowed to root outside the whole summer!
Go explore along dirt roads and crooked paths. Listen to the nature without any noise.
Water lily bay, with a rich birdlife.
Perfect place for a picnic, and to see the sunset.
Use the boat for a row and fishing.
Old-fashioned mowing field. Here you find flowers and plants that are now hard to find in a modern farming environment.
